User-agent: *
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /wp-admin/
Disallow: /cgi-bin/
Disallow: /private/
Disallow: /search?q=*
Disallow: /izvodjaci/*?*
Disallow: /*.pdf$
Disallow: /*.zip$

# Block aggressive/useless scrapers
User-agent: MJ12bot
Disallow: /
User-agent: DotBot
Disallow: /
User-agent: BLEXBot
Disallow: /

# Throttle Ahrefs if they are hitting you too hard
User-agent: AhrefsBot
Crawl-delay: 10

# Bingbot supports crawl-delay
User-agent: Bingbot
Crawl-delay: 2

Sitemap: https://ejmajstore.rs/sitemap.xml
